required_metafields.name: Artist
required_metafields.description: The artist or performer name for music products. Used for grouping and search.

required_metafields.name: Album Title
required_metafields.description: The album or release title. Used for grouping products with the same album.

required_metafields.name: Album
required_metafields.description: Album name (alternative to title).

required_metafields.name: Format
required_metafields.description: The physical format of the product (e.g., Vinyl LP, CD, Cassette). Used for grouping and filtering.

required_metafields.name: Computed Formats
required_metafields.description: List of all available formats for this release.

required_metafields.name: Media Condition
required_metafields.description: The condition of the media/record itself (e.g., Mint, Near Mint, Very Good). Used for filtering.

required_metafields.name: Sleeve Condition
required_metafields.description: The condition of the sleeve/cover (e.g., Mint, Near Mint, Very Good). Used for filtering.

required_metafields.name: Condition
required_metafields.description: General condition rating.

required_metafields.name: Media Rating
required_metafields.description: Media condition rating.

required_metafields.name: Cover Rating
required_metafields.description: Cover/sleeve condition rating.

required_metafields.name: Style/Genre
required_metafields.description: The musical style or genre (legacy field).

required_metafields.name: Computed Style/Genre
required_metafields.description: The musical style or genre (computed list). Used for filtering and search relevance.

required_metafields.name: Master Label
required_metafields.description: The record label name (primary). Used for 'More from' sections and filtering.

required_metafields.name: Label
required_metafields.description: Record label name (alternative field).

required_metafields.name: Computed Label
required_metafields.description: Computed label name.

required_metafields.name: Computed Other Labels
required_metafields.description: List of other record labels associated with this release.

required_metafields.name: Computed Other Artists
required_metafields.description: List of other artists featured on this release.

required_metafields.name: Release Date
required_metafields.description: The release date of the album/release.

required_metafields.name: Computed Release Year
required_metafields.description: The release year (extracted from release date).

required_metafields.name: Catalog Number
required_metafields.description: Catalog number for the release.

required_metafields.name: Catalogue Number
required_metafields.description: Catalogue number (alternative to catno).

required_metafields.name: Collectibility Score
required_metafields.description: Collectibility or rarity score for the item.

required_metafields.name: Enhanced Keywords
required_metafields.description: Enhanced search keywords for improved discoverability.

required_metafields.name: Location
required_metafields.description: Physical storage location (for store owner/staff use).

required_metafields.name: Has 360 View
required_metafields.description: Whether the product has a 360-degree view available.

required_metafields.name: Tracklist
required_metafields.description: Track listing for the album/release.

installation_instructions.note: These metafields must be created via the Shopify Admin API. Themes cannot create metafield definitions directly. Use the app's bulk endpoint or create them manually in Shopify Admin > Settings > Custom data > Products.
